--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Beachcomber stood up, he didnt have a clue where to begin, but he 
had to
> do something. His eyes narrowed, as he put his fingers together. 
They
> erupted a low powered laser, which he then used to open up the
chest 
of
> Redhot, and now scanned inside, for anything out of place.



    ::REDHOT::

    Redhot's eye's opened a crack when the stranger began on his 
chest. The lazer was painful at first. It caused him to yelp loudly 
until his pain receptors drowned out the burning. Once it faded he 
relaxed. He groaned and quietly tolerated the Autobot's prodding.
    (OOC: Internally, Redhot is truely ALIEN. At least at first. 
Further inspection would find simularities. Mechanisms would be 
different shapes, in the wrong location, or BeachComber wouldn't 
recognize them at all.  However, many of Redhot's mechanisms would be 
'recognizable'.)


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
